description: Variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission reference 24/0938/HSE dated 16/05/24 for 'Two storey rear extension with hipped roof and part flat roof at apex between existing roof following removal of existing rear loggia and balcony. Roof extension involving front, side and rear dormer windows and 1no. flat rooflight. Conversion of garage into habitable space including insertion of side access door, insertion of windows to replace garage doors. Repositioning and replacement of front door and portico. Replacement of existing windows and changes to openings. Replacement of rainwater goods. Replacement of soffit and fascia. Repositioning of boiler flue. Installation of CCTV cameras and EV charger point. Resurfacing of driveway and rear patio. Removal of swimming pool replaced with new lawn. Repointing of brickwork.' Variation to include replacement of 2no. rear dormer windows with one larger dormer window
decision_conditions: C405 - Roof not to be used as balcony
C408 - *PD: No windows or doors in bldg
